featured.text: Underwear may be worn as one prefers.
Soon after that, adolescent girls around the world began wearing their underwear outside their clothes.
What’s the proper way of wearing the kilt? (A) It should be worn with underwear underneath it.

definition.zh_def: 內衣，通常穿在外衣下面的衣物。
definition.en_def: Clothing worn beneath outer clothes, typically next to the skin.
definition.example: She bought new underwear for the summer.
